summary.description:
Today, cooler for the inside temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 19 miles), feels like temperature (up 3.0°C), dew point temperature (up 4.3°C), and outside temperature (up 3.5°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and moderately breezy. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Similar weather conditions should remain.
